First Name: John
Jane
Instructions:
1. First Name - Client's legal first name
2. Last Name - Client's legal last name
3. Email Address - Valid email for account access
4. Phone Number - Contact number (optional but recommended)
5. Role - Leave as 'user' for clients, 'admin' for administrators
6. Account Number - Unique identifier (e.g., ACC001, ACC002, etc.)
7. Principal Amount - Initial loan amount in dollars
8. Monthly Rate (%) - Monthly interest rate as percentage (e.g., 1.0 for 1%)
9. Loan Date - Date loan was issued (YYYY-MM-DD format)
10. Initial Transaction Type - Use 'loan' for initial disbursement
11. Initial Transaction Amount - Same as Principal Amount for initial loan
12. Transaction Description - Brief description of the transaction
13. Document Category - Type of document (loan_agreement, identification, financial_statement, etc.)
14. Document Title - Descriptive title for the document
Notes:
- Each row represents one client
- All clients will need to set their password after account creation
- Account numbers must be unique
- Email addresses must be unique
- Monthly rates are stored as decimals (1% = 1.0)
- Documents will need to be uploaded separately after account creation
- Additional transactions can be added later through the system
